pullrequest.title: ready for detailed lidar spec input

content.raw:
As of [570a183](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/570a1830a26b9c83f35869acd19f592716b3ddbb?at=multiple-lidar-versions), the default lidar behaves like the 16 beam specified above \(as does the 16 beam when specified via yaml file\) and the 32 beam option acts as specified above.

Small Issues:

min range is currently not a parameter, will take some work to add that

there is a resolution parameter in the wamv\_3d\_lidar \(currently 0.1 m for both 16 beam and 32 beam\) which is not specified here
content.html:
As of 570a183, the default lidar behaves like the 16 beam specified above (as does the 16 beam when specified via yaml file) and the 32 beam option acts as specified above.

Small Issues:

min range is currently not a parameter, will take some work to add that

there is a resolution parameter in the wamv_3d_lidar (currently 0.1 m for both 16 beam and 32 beam) which is not specified here
